item.title: Middleman and Cloud Foundry
item.description: Middleman is a static site generator; Cloud Foundry is a Platform as a Service. Deploying a Middleman static site to Cloud Foundry can be achieved in two ways: building the site and pushing the resultant static files configuring Middleman to integrate with a Rack-enabled webserver and pushing everything. Serving static files is more efficient than running a Rack-enabled webserver, and additionally will not require any extra files or configuration. It is therefore the preferred option.
